subject: Setting label User::Home to home directories
commitMessage:
Setting label User::Home to home directories

Change-Id: I28f199d7498d9b909b26d87a618f94506dd16f17
Signed-off-by: José Bollo <jose.bollo@open.eurogiciel.org>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Thank you.
Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

- Please rebase and unify with the latest commit on tizen branch ("clean spec file")
- The package already provided useradd.local file, located in the source repository in etc/useradd.local. We already have local modifications to files in that directory, why don't you modify etc/useradd.local and provide it as a source file?
Uploaded patch set 2.

Patch Set 2: Verified+1

Thank you to have seen my wrong base! rebased done.

About the choice of setting a separate useradd.local in packaging, it is because it is very specific to tizen thus I though that it had to aside.

Patch Set 2:

(2 comments)

just style remarks
Uploaded patch set 3.
Patch Set 3: Verified+1

Patch Set 2:

(2 comments)
Patch Set 3: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 3: Code-Review+2

When security-manager gets support for user management, I'd like to move home labeling there. Your change does the good job now, let's proceed.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
